Hi  i do not have experience with booking of flights before. I would like to seek suggestions for flight to Hong kong  how should i go about booking of the tickets for cheaper flights? Throughtrip.com  agoda or scoot website?I will be intending to use UOB lady's card.

Search for the cheapest options on skyscanner. Then  I recommend booking directly w the airline because if anything goes wrong  airline will direct you to the agent that you bought from to resolve (i.e. if you booked directly with them  you resolve with them  whereas if you booked through a website liketrip.comor agoda  you have to wait to talk to a customer service agent from there)
Hard to say.. For example  Apple iCloud subscription charged to credit card on recurring basis is an online transaction and M1 recurring payment is not. The safest way is to pay manually
